DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , open-labeled , non-comparative study examine safety efficacy ASP1585 long-term dosing chronic kidney disease patient hyperphosphatemia dialysis .
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Study Chronic Kidney Disease Patients With Hyperphosphatemia Not Dialysis
